description: Guernsey Dairy says milk sales have declined "consistently" in the last 10 years.
title: Guernsey dairy farmers to have production cut by 10%
title_page: Guernsey dairy farmers to have production cut by 10% - BBC News
maintext: It would also seek to ensure all of its farms reached the RSPCA "Farm Assured" standard, awarded to those who engaged in "the very highest levels of animal welfare".
